forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Attract & Repel!

comments.text: Hi all! As of v139.1 (you're on [version]), parts can now attract or repel thrown/ emitted things!
Just use e.g. "When starts then set attract 25" to attract another thing, or e.g. "When touched then set repel 10".
The strength number is the force as well as max radius in meters.
and Update 141.1: The Area "..." option "Only editors set videos" is now named "Only editors change screens", and will protect web screens as well! Thx Lynk!
Update 142.1: Attract & repel can now use an optional thing name filter! Thx Spider, Jinx, Gio & Nic!

thread.latestCommentText: Update 142.1: Attract & repel can now use an optional thing name filter! Thx Spider, Jinx, Gio & Nic!
